FAX: (650) 963-3255	Phone: 1-513-561-3057


Attn: Google Legal Support, MCA Complaints
(650) 963-3255, Attn: Google Legal Support, bMCA Complaints

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following pages:

http://www.bernardine.com/birthstone/color.htm#blue http://www.bernardine.com/birthstone/color.htm#green


2. Infringing Web Pages:
Search Query: "Blue is the color of the element of Water. It symbolizes the ocean 
http://kiwijewels.com/gemstone_meanings.htm 
Search Query: "Green is the color that represents money, prosperity http://kiwijewels.com/gemstone_meanings.htm


3. Contact: copyright@bernardine.com.

4. Contact information for infringing webpages: Kennon, Gene nixstyx@hotmail.com
Kiwi Jewels
6863 Mt Morris-Nunda Road
Mt Morris, New York 14510
United States
5856589031

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

7. [signed]
Nancy Bernardine 
Bernardine Fine Art Jewelry
http://www.bernardine.com







Attn: Google Legal Support, MCA Complaints
